Uses of Package
vista.graph

Packages that use vista.graph

vista.app.schematic   
vista.graph   
 

Classes in vista.graph used by vista.app
Animate
          An interface for elements that animate
AnimateElement
          The base class for objects that need to be animated.
AnimationObservable
          A non-thread based class for efficiency.
AnimationObserver
          A element that needs to be an observer needs to implement this interface
Animator
          This class handles the animation.
AnimatorCanvas
           
Axis
          Axis contains a TickLine for ticks, TickText for tick labels, TextLine for axis labels.
Bounded
          This interface is implemented by any object that has bounds defined by a rectangular region.
BoundedComposite
          This interface defines the layoutable object.
Composite
          A composite of bounded objects.
Curve
          A superclass of all curves.
CurveAttr
          Attributes for the Curve Element
CurveDataModel
          An interface containing the data required for drawing a Curve.
Drawable
          This defines the interface for objects that can draw themselves in a given region.
DrawableComposite
          This is an interface to a composite of drawable elements.
FontResizable
          Any class that implements this interface has a method that allows the resizing of font by scaling, heuristics or strict bounds.
GEAttr
          Encapsulates all attributes of a GraphicElement.
GECanvas
          This class handles the passing of messages to and from the GraphicElement object.
GEContainer
          This the base class for all graphic element container classes.
Graph
          This class manages the plot, its title and its legend.
GraphFrameInterface
           
GraphicElement
          This the base class for all graphic components.
Layoutable
          This interface defines the layoutable object.
PieChartModel
           
PieModel
           
RangeActor
          This is the interface implemented by a class that is interested in using the range selector and which needs to be informed about the range selected and when the selection operation is completed
RangeSelected
          Represents the state of selection of a 2D area
TickGenerator
          Generates information for tick placement and their associated labels using a range of given maximum and minimum.

TickData
          This class encapsulates tick data information such as the data values at which to place ticks and the length of the tick as a percentage of the drawing area.

          Generates information for tick placement and their associated labels using a range of given maximum and minimum.
TickLine
          This implements a line with major ticks and minor ticks.

TickText
          A class handling TextLine objects which share common data values.
TickTextAttr
          Attributes of a TickText
Zoom
          This class handles the zooming in and zooming out on Graph class.
